text: National Mechanics (Spanish:Mecánica nacional) is a 1972 Mexican comedy drama movie directed by Luis Alcoriza and starring Manolo Fábregas, Lucha Villa, Héctor Suárez, Sara García, Alma Muriel, Pancho Córdova, Aurora Clavel, Alejandro Ciangherotti. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 comedy-drama movies Category:Mexican comedy movies Category:Mexican drama movies
title: National Mechanics
